issue.title: [C++] Add push generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11935](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11935). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Sometimes a producer of values just wants to queue futures and let a consumer pop them iteratively.
